text: Na'ankure ana knafina mago'a havige kraisi'e huza efore nehu'za, kasnampa vahe efore hu'za, haviza hu'za kagu'vazane avame'za hugahaze. Anama hanazana Anumzamo'ma huhampri zmante'nea vahe'mokizmi, rezmataga hu'naku hugahaze. Hianagi zamagra Anumzamo'ma huhampri zamante'nea vahe'ma zamazeri savari hu'nakuma hanuza anara hugahaze.
